meta.title: Max Janorschke | Web Developer
meta.description: Max Janorschke is a web developer from Herzogenrath. He develops websites and web applications with React and Typescript.

about-me.part2: I'm Max, {0} years old and a MATSE trainee. During my apprenticeship I focused on frontend development with React and Typescript.
about-me.part3: In my free time I develop my own software projects, so that I have the opportunity to try out new technologies and constantly expand my knowledge. Thereby I have focused on JavaScript and built up my knowledge in different frameworks:

plagge-it.employmentType: Temporary help in the area of software development

stock-management.name: Stock-management for the university Siegen
stock-management.part1: Implementation of front-end and back-end functionality for inventories, tool loans, purchase orders and material withdrawals.
stock-management.part2: Management of material withdrawals on mobile devices via the Progressive Web App (PWA) with barcode scanner and offline functionality.

evaluation-tool.name: Evaluation-tool FH-Aachen
evaluation-tool.part1: Development of a tool for the analysis of evaluations of the FH-Aachen, based on Mentimeter with user administration.

roomlight.name: Roomlight
roomlight.part1: Roomlight, which is controlled by motion detectors.
roomlight.part2: Configuration of the lighting via an MQTT server.

veda-horizon.name: VEDA Horizon
veda-horizon.part1: Implementation of frontend and backend functionality for personnel management software
veda-horizon.part2: Introduction of React and Typescript, as a new frontend framework.
